subject: Horse Racing
Deaths (Fatalities)
lead_paragraph: The chaplain’s office at Ruidoso Downs in Hobbs, N.M., established a memorial fund to benefit the family of jockey Mark Villa, who died in a weekend accident at Zia Park.
snippet: The chaplain’s office at Ruidoso Downs in Hobbs, N.M., established a memorial fund to benefit the family of jockey Mark Villa, who died in a weekend accident at Zia Park.
